author: ryanleeschneider
content:
In the Zoom chat on https://www.youtube.com/live/FhMBatolkOM?si=I1_EUZCabCKVK_Hf&t=1037 <@486477492434239488> mentioned:

>  Would be useful for L2s to have a guide / template "here is how to integrate blob data verification*
> Or a "blob integration guide" of sorts

Are there any documents like that available?  I'm asking since I'm still a bit unclear on what the "typical" blob workflow will look like so would be very interested in reading anything along those lines.
